title: Moses Pendleton presents Moses Pendleton
creator_credit: Robert Elfstrom, Lucy Hilmer, Momix, Fort Worth Productions and ABC Video Enterprises
brief_description: This is a portrait of Moses Pendleton, choreographer and dancer, presenting the artist at home, alone on his 33rd birthday. The film includes excerpts from “Philopolus” and Pendleton’s own “Momix”, and features music by Erik Satie and the Vienna Philharmonic Orchestra.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Elfstrom, Lucy Hilmer, Momix, Fort Worth Productions and ABC Video Enterprises
